thread.section_title: Flologic Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flologic | flologic.com
thread.title: Andrew Gold

author: Andrew Gold
title: Andrew Gold
text:
My insurance company suggested I buy this to lower my premium so I did.
It was installed by a licensed plumber at a total cost of $1700. We have made numerous adjustments to the flow and even at the lowest the alarm goes off for no reason. I finally shut the machine off completely and have never received any functional use from it....a total and complete waste of money and a very, very frustrating purchase experience for me.
